main event: A witness reported a fair-sized silver disc-shaped object hovering and maneuvering over Needham High School for five minutes on December 14, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as glimmering and disc-shaped., The observation lasted for about 5 minutes before the object disappeared behind trees., The report was made by a Moonwatch personnel to the Technical Intelligence Committee., The witness conveyed the information in a calm and concise manner., The event took place at approximately 4:20 PM E.S.T.
